full_summary:
**Title:**
Advance Procurement Notice for Expert Services in Geotechnical Designated Substance Assessment & Monitoring

**Reference Number:**
MX-42802147558

**Solicitation Number:**
KN71427

**Notice of Tender:**
Aug 15, 2023

**Closing Date and Time:**
Aug 15, 2023 (Time: 16:00) UTC-6

**Notice Issued by:**
Defense Construction Canada - Western Region
Address: 13220 St. Albert Trail, Suite 302, Edmonton, Alberta T5L 4W1, Canada
Contact: Samantha Dien-Taday, Coordinator, Contract Services
Email: [samantha.dien-taday@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.dien-taday@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
Phone: 780-495-5836

**Discussion of Tender:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) intends to acquire a Consultant Services Source List for designated substance assessment and monitoring services.

The estimated value of the proposed contract is approximately CAD 1.5 million over a 3-year period, with an option for a 2-year extension and an additional CAD 1 million. The total potential value for the 5-year contract is CAD 2.5 million.

The Department is seeking consultants with expertise in designated substance assessment and monitoring services to provide expert advice on an 'as and when required' basis.

**Security Clearance:**
Applicants are required to hold a valid and active DESIGNATED ORGANIZATION SCREENING (DOS) at the time of contract award.

**Selection Criteria:**
Selection will be based on expert qualifications, experience, and qualifications.

**Lt proceedings that will follow this notice:**
End user will post a solicitation treaty on merx.com, some fees apply.

**End user will need applicants to have their security status updated using Defence Construction Canada -gov - Defence facility facilitator's psi sponsor group.**

Please note that there is no guarantee that all consultants who apply will be eligible for contract award.

Potential interested consultants who wish to submit a proposal for this solicitation are encouraged to contact Samantha Dien-Taday, Coordinator, Contract Services, at 780-495-5836 to discuss their eligibility.

No vendors have expressed interest in obtaining this contract to be publicized and This notice has been DCC edited for publication.
